title: An Act prohibiting injurious operations or offering services or products that discriminate against or injure protected classes

abstracts.abstract: By Mr. Mark, a petition (accompanied by bill, Senate, No. 1175) of Paul W. Mark for legislation to prohibit injurious operations or offering services or products that discriminate against or injure protected classes.  The Judiciary.

actions.description: Referred to the committee on The Judiciary
Hearing scheduled for 11/25/2025 from 10:00 AM-05:00 PM in A-2
